class.name: Inventor
startingEquipment: A component pouch and a research book
Two artisan tools of your choice

entries: Inventors are brilliant people who bring their ideas to life through ingenuity and craftsmanship. Whether they focus on weaponry, tinkering, or metaphysical experimentation, all Inventors thrive on discovery and clever solutions.
Their power comes not from magic, but from their ability to craft and adapt tools and technology to their needs.

entries.name: Blueprint Crafting
entries: At the end of each long rest, you craft a number of items using the Blueprints in your Research Book, equal to your Inventor level + your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1). Any unused items cease to function or spoil at the start of your next long rest (or 24 hours after it was crafted).
Items created using your blueprints may require attack rolls or saving throws. Use your Intelligence modifier for these calculations.
**Item attack modifier =** Intelligence modifier + proficiency bonus
**Item save DC =** 8 + Intelligence modifier + proficiency bonus

entries.name: Field Researcher
entries: At the end of each short rest, craft a number of blueprint items equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1).
If an item requires an attack roll or saving throw, use your Item attack modifier and Item save DC instead of the normal values.

entries.name: Academic Focus
entries: Choose a specialty in your field of research. Your options are: Ammosmith, Apothecary, Demolitionist, Engineer, Gourmand, or Scavenger.
You gain features from your focus at levels 2, 6, 10, 14, and 18.

entries.name: Item Expert
entries: You can use the Search or Use an Object action as a bonus action.
Your blueprint items count as magical for overcoming resistance and immunity.

entries.name: Quick Witted
entries: Once per turn, if you take the Use an Object action, you can use two items instead of one.
If an item has limited uses, gain extra uses equal to your proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Magnum Opus
entries: Your Dexterity and Intelligence scores increase by +4, and their maximums increase to 24.
You add a Magnum Opus blueprint to your Research Book.
You may only craft one Magnum Opus item per long rest.
